storyInfo: Remaining in town, Carmen and Kal'tsit attempt to dispose of the wicked cultists before the Penal Battalion arrives, improvising a frontline position. The voyage for the lighthouse's waters is far from plain sailing, and the Hunters have no option but to confront the Sea Terror menace head on—as well as a mysterious guest.

attributes.content: Eugh... What is this—disgusting floor? What's happening?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Is it the Sea Terrors?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Thiago.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: ...Amaia.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: What's going on? Didn't you say those Church of the Deep cultists wouldn't show up? They've made a complete mess of the place.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Thiago, I came to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: It's about time for me to, and the opportunity is hard to come by now. That's all it is.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Thiago.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The Inquisitors are here. A whole three of them.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Jordi's in their hands.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Don't, Thiago. Jordi came back by his own will. And what can you do against three Inquisitors?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Does he know what it means to be found by the Inquisition?!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: You've told him so many times that I'd be shocked if he didn't.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: But that's how people are. Reason might tell us to take every advantage and avoid the opposite, but people are so complicated, and you can't judge that so easily. I wouldn't call Jordi a fool for his choice.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Now's not the time to argue over morality—!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: This is his nature we're talking about. Character, not morality, Mayor Thiago.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: There's a certain beauty in human nature. Even time can't deny that.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Do you hate the Inquisition?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The Sea Terrors have blanketed this town, but remember, Thiago, remember.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Remember that rainy night, when the Penal Battalion charged into town, breaking down doors. The unending screams drowned out the pitter-patter of the rain.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: No, stop...
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: And now?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The sea's brand is spreading across town—have you heard any screams? Have you seen anyone being senselessly slaughtered, or hunted down?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: You haven't.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Right now, all that remains in Gran Faro—
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: —is stillness.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I never knew... that the ocean was so vast.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The sea breeze blows past.
Jordi cannot believe what's before his eyes. He had always thought the sea's horizon was the sky's end.
Not until witnessing this boundless expanse of waves for himself does Jordi—the Ægir—have a sudden question.
Why has humanity never desired to explore this?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: ...How could we ever determine our position out here? It's not as if the moons are signal beacons, or the stars could be read like a map.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Um, why can't we read the stars like a map?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Ask a professional astronomer and find out.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Then... if Ægir really is under the water, then how big is it? Bigger than Iberia?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: There's a handful of genuine Ægir over there. How about you ask them?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: They seem like they have their own worries, though. They're all so solemn.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Shark, what are you listening to?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...The wind.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There's an offering of kin mingled with the sea breeze. It puts me... much at ease.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: She gets more like this the closer we are to the sea.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Even though in Sal Viento, she was so...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Do you know why?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I could guess, but it would only disturb your judgment. We have a battle before us.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Did you ever attempt to return to the sea, after your narrow escape to shore?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Of course. I failed.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: There was no end to them. They surrounded me. I ran out of strength before I could even swim far.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I tried so, so many times.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But you're still alive.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We are all well aware of the changes in our bodies, Skadi. You included.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Shark may have suffered some injury, but none of my Hunters are so fragile.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: And she's the same as us.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: 'Specter.' Once a victim of the Church of the Deep. Originium, absent in the ocean, has affected her in a whole host of ways.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Why bring along such an uncertain element?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: We are going home. It does not concern you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Home? But circumstances in Ægir can hardly be better than in Iberia.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Raise your lantern, Inquisitor. Let's prepare to greet our first enemies.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Oh. They've come.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: One final question.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Are there really only three Abyssal Hunters?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: If there were others, I would have long since found them.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...What compels you to ask?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Ominous slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Unexpected Sea Terrors

attributes.content: Is this ship's course true?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Undoubtedly.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: ...Then the Sea Terrors are becoming more explicitly hostile as we approach the Eye of Iberia.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Perhaps it is already their nest. Fighting them aboard this ship would waste far too much time.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Skadi, Shark, defend this vessel. Keep an eye on the primitive signal navigation facilities while you're at it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I will enter the sea.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You are stronger in the sea, but so are they. And we cannot bleed down there; the risk is too high.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Wh-What's wrong?! Are there monsters attacking again?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: No, I can't see any! We don't know what's happening under the water, but—
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: That muffled booming! What's going on down there? Is she fighting below?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: She's just... moving. She's faster in the water.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: ...How can anyone move faster through water than air?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Habit, I guess. Or maybe it's a skill.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The Sea Terrors are following her. She's opened up a passage.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Irene, take Breogan's descendant and continue to steer.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Pick up speed before the enemy surrounds us.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: They've left. The seas won't be peaceful.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you worry for them, we'd best hurry and finish up our business.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Gran Faro is only an outpost to recapture the lighthouse. Retaking it is all that matters.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I'm surprised that Iberia can already exploit Ægir technology to resist the encroaching nethersea brand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Regardless, the rate of its evolution is faster than any one scientist's genius. If we seek victory, we must use whatever we can.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Even an army, I see.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...This is an plain, unremarkable town.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Perhaps there are more strategic locations waiting for the Inquisition to recapture them, one by one. More favorable battlefields, grander walls and fortifications.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: But, sometimes, it's fine to start with what's at hand.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: However many Iberians are willing to fight to the death against the waves, that is how many soldiers we can field.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Let us begin the cleanup.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: (Unabated slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: Hey... Are we still not there yet?!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: A-According to the nautical map, we should be able to at least see it by now...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: High Inquisitor! We have to head deeper in, or else—
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Look up.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: What? It's nothing but black overhead, I can't see—
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: No... that's not... that's not the sky...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: They've made it their nest by now. Very close to the shore; no wonder their numbers are so great.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We can just cut them all down. Like before.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: ...Yes, like before.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Shark?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So that is... their eye? Why does it feel so familiar?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It has been caked in filth for too long, unable to open its lid.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'll clear a path. Jordi, come with us.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Ah. O-Okay... I hope I can be of help...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: No. There's something only you can do.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: If you can't, then we'll have to change strategies and prioritize ensuring that the Inquisition's technicians can make it here safely.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: And in the battle to come, we'll have no time to care for the fate of a solipsistic Ægir.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You seem nervous.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Ægir. You don't understand what finally reaching this island again signifies for us.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: And what would that be?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Ever since the Penal Battalion discovered remnant signals from the lighthouse, we've made seventeen attempts to make landfall, eight of which succeeded in setting foot on this reef.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Hundreds of soldiers, and three Inquisitors. No one returned alive.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Don't tell me your superior Ægir ethics teach you to respect your heroes, but forsake their memory?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: The High Inquisitor and I... the Iberians will hold a memorial for those who died at sea.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: I did not mean to pick at your morals. All I can say is that, in the face of the ocean, we are all alone and weak.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Do as you wish, but we are pressed for time.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A foot falls on the reef.
A colossus hides in the jet-black winds. Only by tilting one's head back and gazing far up can one distinguish it from the murky sky.
The Eye of Iberia.
A final pair of eyes, sealed shut.
So tall...
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: The scale of that statue in town has to be wrong...
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: High Inquisitor.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: This is what we once...
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: It is... my first time seeing it as well.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: The two remain silent for a moment, dead in their tracks as they look over at this vast spectacle that's survived only in documents and records.
The enduring reality of Iberia goes far beyond what she was taught, Irene thinks. Despite the Abyssal Hunters' ample disdain for them, despite the balance of the nation well and truly crumbling.
Despite it all, this lighthouse is an emblem. Of past glory and wild ambition. Of dreams and the domination of the unknown.
Whatever feelings may roil in your heart at this moment, engrave them all.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: This building, these worn swords and lanterns, these reefs, this ocean.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Carve into your heart just what humanity has built in its struggle. Keep it with you forever, at all times.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: If we do not venerate our sacrifices, our scales are meaningless.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Enter carefully.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Have we come home?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: No, not yet.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But if we find what Kal'tsit and the Captain are looking for here, maybe we can.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Just hold on... we're almost there.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: It's too quiet.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But it still stinks.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Yes. The reef is coated in remnant nethersea brand. I can see traces of man-made objects too, rotted for the most part.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Gladiia paces slowly. She looks up at the tower, standing against the tenebrous sky.
The Eye of Iberia is directed towards the heavens, as if upon this finite soil, life cranes its neck, wanting to see the future.
The nations of the land have done all they can to reproduce Breogan's remaining legacy. These so-called lighthouses are an emulation of Ægir technology through and through.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What can this lighthouse be awaiting, sat in this void and empty sea?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Does it watch the ocean, or the land, I wonder.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I know. Within is a Sea Terror nest. The lack of an immediate attack may merely be defensive, a guarding of the den.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It is about time they come.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Ominous slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: There's not... too many.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The sea. The coast is already out of sight.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Sentimental?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: No... I just mean, we can't bleed here. It'll be extremely dangerous.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They can't pierce our skin. So long as you do not cease your dance, these numbers are insufficient to kill us.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (The lighthouse... It really is just like the statue in town.)
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (Which means, those blueprints at home really were from my mother and father. For the Eye of Iberia...)
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (My parents were once... in this very place.)
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Jordi looks back towards the shore.
Each and every day, his mind went back to his view of that overcast shore. A lifeless gray, a hopeless crowd.
But, ah, look at this lighthouse, he thinks.
Uncle Thiago was right. They were all heroes. They were all meant to be legends.
...The Abyssal Hunters should be regrouping not far from here. They will be joining this battle too.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Don't forget what you experienced in Sal Viento. Their blood is highly unusual, and Kal'tsit hardly told us everything.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: U-Understood. So they can't be trusted.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: What did you see, beneath the Inquisition?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: —Erk.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: 'Seaborn.'
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: You should still remember their twistedness, their vitality, their... serenity.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: In Sal Viento, the Hunters did battle such a monster, and emerged victorious.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: I... I know that.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: You've seen the truth, so now you must reassess your past, and Iberia.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Tear apart the old, swimming through your head! Make your own judgments.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Y-Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: —(Rough sounds of slithering over reef)—
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: They're ready for us. Withdrawn to defend their nest, waiting for the chance to strike. Here to drive out the invaders.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Jordi. Report?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: R-Right! It's a miracle, really. These control panels outside are still responding, but I'm not sure what theory these things are based on...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I-I'm looking though! I have all those research notes from home with me in my bag!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: ...Be quick about it.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: I know! It's this one... No, that's not it... Eek, when did this one get wet?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: High Inquisitor! They're here!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: The billows rage forth.
Their arrogance surges dozens of meter high, shattering one day after another, succumbing to the reef and the three moons.
One moon is bright. One moon is dark. These are the moons spoken of throughout time, hung in the sky.
The remaining moon comes from the intervals betwixt the waves, at the peaks of every crest.
The moonlight comes from the title he once believed in.
